description: I. Letter dated 27/11/2007 from David Hanson MP to Andrew Dismore MP, Chair of the Joint Committee on Human Rights, regarding the use of restraint in secure training centres, includes annexes. 18 p. II. Contract between Her Majesty's principal secretary of state for the Home Department and ECD (Onley) Limited, for the provision of a Secure Training Centre at Onley, 03/07/1998. 136 p. III. Schedule A to contract for a secure training centre at Onley, design and build specification. 286 p.
